start.write_group_number: Enter the number of group according to your religion:
start.please_insert_age: Please enter your child age in numbers
start.please_insert_child_num: Please enter your child number in munbers

Attention1.egges_q: How many eggs are in the picture?
Attention1.ducks_q: How many ducks are in the water?

Attention2.bees_q: How many bees are in the picture?

opening_stages.subtitle:
We are going on a fantasy journey.
This is about what is important in your life.
It is about which goals you have for your life; that is where you want to be in life.
This person with the striped cap and the grey top. Imagine that this is you!.
Perhaps, it is not that easy to imagine this.
It may be that you don’t wear such a grey top and such a striped cap...
Don’t care about that.
Just imagine that this is you.
Now think of yourself!
Imagine how you would like to be in your future life.
Which goals do you want to achieve?
In front of you, you also see some small pictures. Each picture has a title.
Look at the pictures.
you will be able to find that person in them.
Let's go over them one by one.
And you can already start thinking about what is more important to you in life and what is less important.

opening2_stages.subtitle: Well done! We will now play the game again with different pictures. We will go over them one by one.
Imagine again that you are this person with the gray shirt.
And that you are the one doing all of these things.

pbvs.text: to show what I can do
to learn something from the past
